snippet.title: Prepare for Fear: Official Trailer for 'Dwelling' – Launching August 15, 2024! #horrorgaming #scary
snippet.description:
Get ready for an unforgettable horror experience! 🌌 We are excited to announce that Dwelling will be launching on August 15, 2024!

Prepare to dive into a world of chilling thrills and spine-tingling adventures. Don’t miss out on the chance to explore the darkness that awaits.

📌 🎮 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3066010/Dwelling 

🌟 Stay Tuned: The full game is coming soon on Steam! Follow us for updates and exclusive content.

👍 👀 Make sure to like, share, and subscribe to our channel for the latest updates. Follow our social media channels to connect with us and join the community:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
🌐 Website: https://kodextra.com
👾 Discord: https://discord.gg/uUBxp4VMhS
𝕏  https://x.com/kodextrastudios
🅾 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kode_xtra/ 
ⓕ Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/kodextra
@ Threads: https://www.threads.net/@kode_xtra
💼 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/kodextra-solutions-pvt-ltd
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
🔥 Thank you for your support, and get ready to face the fear! 🔥 
.
.
#DwellingTrailer #trailer  #IndependenceDay #DwellingGame #jumpscare  #HorrorGame #steamrelease #kodextrastudio #scary #viral #haunted #horrorgaming #indiegame #startup  @IGN @IGNIndia @UnrealEngine @EpicGamesStore @Steam @ArtStationHQ @SonyAnimation @Sony
